examples: Everyone has different interests.
The news of his sudden death stunned everyone.
Everyone has to pay their taxes.
Everyone has to make a living.
Everyone had a ball at the party.
words.defineEn: every single person in a group, community, or society, without exception
words.defineVi: mọi người trong một nhóm, cộng đồng hoặc xã hội, không có ngoại lệ

examples: Everything gives umbrage to a tyrantny.
Everything worked very smoothly.
Everything went pear-shaped.
Everything was free
The wind had coated everything with a layer of sand.
words.defineEn: all things, events, etc.
words.defineVi: mọi sự vật, sự kiện, v.v.

examples: She followed her sister everywhere.
The effects of the recession are being felt everywhere.
I looked everywhere with a fine-toothed comb but can't find my purse.
I searched everywhere for the letter and it was under my nose all the time!
The swimmer jumped into the pool and splashed water everywhere.
words.defineEn: all the places or directions
words.defineVi: tất cả các địa điểm hoặc hướng

examples: Someone has taken my scarf.
Someone left you this note.
Someone left this note for you.
Someone was coming.
Someone has stacked the cards against me.
words.defineEn: a person who is not mentioned by name
words.defineVi: một người không được nhắc tên

examples: The company ought to do something about the poor service.
The incident has remained something of an elephant in the room within our family.
Something is not making sense here.
There is something in the wind.
To take a shot at somebody/something.
words.defineEn: used to mention a thing that is not known or named
words.defineVi: được sử dụng để đề cập đến một điều mà không được biết đến hoặc đặt tên

examples: Somewhere within, a harp was playing.
I know it's here somewhere!
Let's go somewhere where we can talk to our hearts' content.
And that's fair enough, that somebody brings them to book somewhere.
The book I'm looking for should lie somewhere on this bookshelf.
words.defineEn: used to mention a place that is not known or is not named
words.defineVi: được sử dụng để đề cập đến một địa điểm không được biết đến hoặc không được đặt tên

examples: It is someplace.
So our angle theta is going to put us someplace over here.
That would go someplace like that.
So someplace on this chromosome, there's a gene for hair straightness.
Or did she say it someplace else?
words.defineEn: used to mention a place that is not exactly known or is not named
words.defineVi: được sử dụng để đề cập đến một địa điểm không được biết chính xác hoặc không được đặt tên

examples: No one knows the answer.
No one makes a monkey out of me.
No one paid them any attention.
I fear no one.
no one could take their eyes off her.
words.defineEn: used to say not even one person
words.defineVi: từng nói thậm chí không một người

examples: Money means nothing to him.
Nothing is forever.
Hold nothing back.
Their performance was nothing to write home about.
This argument has nothing to do with me.
words.defineEn: not a single thing
words.defineVi: không phải là một điều duy nhất

examples: Bad manners will get you nowhere.
I wanted to talk to him but he was nowhere to be found.
The politician was quick to take credit for the country's economic growth, but when the economy took a downturn, he was nowhere to be found.
When their car broke down in the middle of nowhere, the stranded family had to resort to Shanks' mare and walk several miles until they reached the nearest town.
All nothing but futile attempts that went nowhere.
words.defineEn: not any single place
words.defineVi: không phải bất kỳ nơi nào

examples: Have you shown anyone your work?
Are you seeing anyone?
Hardly anyone stands on ceremony.
Anyone in her shoes would have done the same thing.
Have you shown your work to anyone?
words.defineEn: used for referring to a person when who that person is does not matter
words.defineVi: được sử dụng để đề cập đến một người khi người đó là ai không quan trọng

examples: She does anything for a quiet life.
Has anything been decided yet?
I couldn’t hear anything.
He'd do anything for you.
He'd do anything for you.
words.defineEn: used for referring to a thing when it is not important what that thing is
words.defineVi: được sử dụng để đề cập đến một điều khi nó không quan trọng điều đó là gì

examples: Robins build nests almost anywhere.
Are you getting anywhere?
You won’t get anywhere without qualifications.
Being rude to me won't get you anywhere.
Losing your temper won’t get you anywhere.
words.defineEn: used to mention any place
words.defineVi: được sử dụng để đề cập đến bất cứ nơi nào

examples: Other students followed her lead and boycotted lectures.
The lovers held each other close.
Other football stakeholders also got a share of the cake.
Join the other kids.
Share your thoughts with other people.
words.defineEn: a person or thing that is different or distinct from one already mentioned or known about
words.defineVi: một người hoặc điều đó là khác nhau hoặc khác biệt từ một đã được đề cập hoặc biết về

examples: Her answer is no.
This policy is no longer an effective means to an end.
Journalists on the spot reported no progress.
They mean no harm.
They mean no harm.
words.defineEn: not one; not any
words.defineVi: không một; không có

examples: My dad doesn't play golf any more.
Any investment involves an element of risk.
A self-made vase will give any interior a touch of originality.
No conventional drugs had produced any significant change.
No one paid them any attention.
words.defineEn: one or some of a thing or number of things, however large or small
words.defineVi: một hoặc một số thứ hoặc một số thứ, dù lớn hay nhỏ

examples: In my opinion, none of the new jazz trumpeters are on a par with Miles Davis.
There are none so deaf as those that will not hear.
Just take out the trash like I asked you to, and none of your lip!
I told him it was none of his business.
While it's always better to be honest, sometimes a bad excuse is better than none, especially if it can help diffuse a tense situation.
words.defineEn: not any of the members of a group of people or things
words.defineVi: không phải bất kỳ thành viên nào của một nhóm người hoặc vật

examples: His new world record will take some beating.
Those young people have some guts.
Save some food for me.
Save some energy for the end of the race.
They still have some surprises up their sleeves.
words.defineEn: being an unknown amount or number of something
words.defineVi: là một số lượng không xác định hoặc số lượng của một cái gì đó

examples: The hotel provides fresh towels for the guests every day.
My grandma bakes a delicious persimmon pie every Thanksgiving.
Every age has its book, after all.
The apple tree in our backyard produces juicy fruits every year.
My son reads twelve pages of his book every day.
words.defineEn: (used before a singular noun) including or referencing all the members of a group of things or people
words.defineVi: (được sử dụng trước một danh từ số ít) bao gồm hoặc tham chiếu đến tất cả các thành viên của một nhóm đồ vật hoặc người

examples: Don't worry about breaking the bank either.
I know that I'm often my worst enemy, but he's not that innocent either.
All my friends were either lovey-dovey couples or wild, single girls.
A door must be either shut or open.
The first batters either missed or walked.
words.defineEn: one or the other of two things or people, no matter which
words.defineVi: cái này hay cái kia của hai sự vật hoặc con người, bất kể điều gì

examples: The strong winds knocked down several trees on the road.
Several chances came our way
The senator held the floor for several hours.
Several candidates were called for a second interview.
The agreement came after several hours of negotiations.
words.defineEn: a number of things or people, more than two but not many
words.defineVi: một số thứ hoặc người, nhiều hơn hai nhưng không nhiều

examples: Three cheers for Sarah, whose brilliant goal at the last minute won us the game!
The Beatles are a band that have become a household name and whose music is still popular decades later.
He is a self-interested liar, whose sole motive throughout his life has been looking after number one.
The scheme is designed to help kids whose parents have fallen on hard times.
Disposal of nuclear waste was a problem whose solution was endlessly delayed, a tar baby no one wanted anything to do with.
words.defineEn: used to show that the thing mentioned belongs to a particular person or thing
words.defineVi: được sử dụng để chỉ ra rằng điều được đề cập thuộc về một người hoặc vật cụ thể

examples: Which team won?
Which door leads to the yard?
Which tie do you like best?
Which opera did Verdi write first?
Coach, which end of the field you want me to take if we lose the toss?
words.defineEn: used to ask or talk about one or more members of a group of things or people, when we are not sure about it or about them
words.defineVi: được sử dụng để hỏi hoặc nói về một hoặc nhiều thành viên của một nhóm đồ vật hoặc con người, khi chúng ta không chắc chắn về điều đó hoặc về họ
